title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
The response must correctly describe what the Human Development Index measures.

For Task A, the response must correctly describe a political system, institution type, process, policy, or behavior.

For Task B, the response must correctly describe the data presented.

For Task C, the response must correctly describe patterns and trends in data.
descriptions: The responses accomplish none of the tasks set by the question
The response accomplishes one of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes two of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes three of the tasks set by the question.
